title: Linux gcc Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the GCC compiler, learn to compile C programs, and discover optimization flags for efficient code.

meta.title: Linux gcc Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the GCC compiler, learn to compile C programs, and discover optimization flags for efficient code.
meta.keywords: GCC, C programming, compiler, optimization, Linux, scripting, programming

steps.title: Understand the Basics of GCC Compiler

verify.name: Verify GCC version
verify.hint: Ensure that the GCC version installed in the environment is 11.3.0.

steps.title: Compile a Simple C Program with GCC

verify.name: Verify C program compilation
verify.hint: Ensure that you have successfully compiled the C program and that the 'hello' executable is present in the expected location.

verify.name: Verify optimization levels
verify.hint: Ensure that the C program compiles and runs correctly with different optimization levels (-O0, -O1, -O2, -O3).
